channel.title: Starter Pack only Allowed Once

item.title: Starter Pack only Allowed Once
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 15000);
addItem(6528, 1);
addItem(554, 20000);
addItem(555, 20000);
addItem(565, 20000);
addItem(556, 20000);
addItem(557, 20000);
addItem(560, 20000);
addItem(561, 20000);
addItem(562, 20000);
addItem(563, 20000);
addItem(566, 20000);
addItem(558, 20000);
sendMessage(“Boosterscape Pk Starter Package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p");

item.title: Starter Pack only Allowed Once
item.dc:creator: @bsk8r bsk8r
item.description:
@bsk8r wrote:

k i did that with my new code being

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 15000000); addItem(392, 1000); addItem(146, 25); addItem(158, 25); addItem(554, 1000); addItem(555, 1000); addItem(556, 1000); addItem(557, 1000); addItem(558, 1000); addItem(559, 1000); addItem(560, 1000); addItem(561, 1000); addItem(562, 1000); addItem(563, 1000); addItem(564, 1000); addItem(565, 1000); addItem(566, 1000); sendMessage("Enjoy your starter pack!"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack!"); }

and still get the same errors, comes up at bottom saying somethin like 100 errors found and lists em all up top… then its fine when i take the

[code]if (starter == 0) {

starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack!”);[/cpde]

and leave it as it was in my first post… it works, but u can claim unlimited starters[/code]

item.description:

here is my code atm

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { addItem(995, 15000000); addItem(392, 1000); addItem(146, 25); addItem(158, 25); addItem(554, 1000); addItem(555, 1000); addItem(556, 1000); addItem(557, 1000); addItem(558, 1000); addItem(559, 1000); addItem(560, 1000); addItem(561, 1000); addItem(562, 1000); addItem(563, 1000); addItem(564, 1000); addItem(565, 1000); addItem(566, 1000); sendMessage("Bloods-Scape Starter Pack!"); }
